alert.note: Alert for Chinati Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Eastern Culberson County; Marfa Plateau; Reeves County Plains; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 10 at 12:49PM CST until January 11 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM CST /9 AM MST/ TO 8 PM CST /7 PM MST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and southwest and western Texas. * WHEN...From 10 AM CST /9 AM MST/ to 8 PM CST /7 PM MST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Blowing dust may reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Chinati Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Eastern Culberson County; Marfa Plateau; Reeves County Plains; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor
